Articles.Content: My second episode in a series of Cinematic videos showing the struggle between two factions. Taking inspiration from Nassault and Macey Dean, trying to combine the two is not easy. It took me two days to edit this 11 minute piece. And while Cinematic videos can be achieved, no one will ever be a "Nassault" or a "Macey Dean" for these two great YouTube persons cannot be compared to. I hope you enjoy my videos as much as I love making them.
